title: Jack London's 'To build a fire'
creator_credit: Robert Stitzel, Molly Miles and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: An adaptation of a Jack London short story about one man’s struggle for survival in the frozen wilderness of the Yukon. Man against nature at its most dangerous. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Stitzel, Molly Miles and BFA Educational Media
